attributes.action: Politics to be taught in schools from middle school onwards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To get children from a younger age interested in politics, to get them to understand the system, so when they are old enough they can vote, with a sound amount of knolage behinfd them, this could also mean an increase in numbers of people that would want to vote and get involved in the whole process, i mean you only have to look at america, who always have record amounts of people bvoting, and youv got to wounder where we are going wrong!
this could change all that!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
